page.title: 17Cricket Tournament - Sussex
page.content: It had been raining for the past two days but the village pitch was fit to play on.I (Neil) watched the days play.In the first round Hartfield played Ashurst and won by 9 wks.In the other matches Ashurst Wood beat Fordcombe and Cowden beat Groombridge. Hammerwood just beat Colemans Hatch.In the first semi-final Hartfield put Ashurst Wood in to bat and had to chase 53 runs.Hartfield got there with 2 overs to spare.In the other match Cowden made 72 ,Hammerwood couldn't get the runs.In the final Hartfield scored 86 without losing a wicket. Cowden started well but collapsed and Hartfield won for the first time since 1980. The following Wednesday Hartfield played against Sussex in a benefit game .All the stars played.Hartfield just lost by 10 runs.We all enjoyed it
